attributes.action: Russell brand to have certain powers to speak in the house of commons.
attributes.additional_details:
Dear all,

I'm sure we have all seen the recent interview with Russell Brand and Jeremy Paxman in which he showed great passion and enthusiasm for change within our government in this country however this is not the first time he has engaged with the public and fought against our current government.He needs to be able to speak in the house of commons, on behalf of us, the public, the voters and the electorates!

He speaks his mind and he speaks freely with great power,So i ask you, why not have some one as lively as Russell Brand to share his opinions that we all agree on in the House of Commons?

Lets use this literate man not just for humor but to connect and rebuild our society.

Thank you.
